channel.title: Projects on Amal Koodoruth
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Amal Koodoruth

item.title: Project III: Image Classification with Deep Learning Methods
item.description: Researched and investigated the performance of ResNets, AlexNet and VGG16 (∼ 95% accuracy) models on a modified Fashion MNIST dataset. Model trained with 48000 images on Python us- ing PyTorch, Pandas, Matplotlib & NumPy. The paper is available here.

item.title: Project II: Pneumonia Detector
item.description: Deep Learning model that uses CNN to read chest x-rays and to predict if someone has pneumonia (∼ 90% accuracy). Model is trained with 5000 images on Python using Tensorflow. The github repository is available here.

item.title: Project I: Math score predictor
item.description: Linear Regression with Mean Absolute Error of about 19% Features used include age, sex, ethnicity, amongst others Model coded from scratch on MATLAB The github repository is available here.
